PHRASE.LANG: What self-respecting clown would be without their red nose? [#Legal]

Kein Clown, der etwas auf sich hält, würde ohne rote Nase herumlaufen. [#Legal]
Qualsiasi clown che si rispetti deve avere il naso rosso. [#Legal]
¿Qué respetable payaso olvidaría su nariz roja? [#Legal]
赤鼻なしでピエロとは言えない！[#Legal]
빨간 코가 없이 스스로를 광대라고 부를 수야 없지요![#Legal]
What self-respecting clown would be without their red nose? [#Legal]
小丑沒有紅鼻子，還怎會像樣？[#Legal]
